name: Flappy Qubes - A Replica of the Original Impossible Qubed Bird Game is Back
name_original: Flappy Qubes - A Replica of the Original Impossible Qubed Bird Game is Back
description:
Tap to change the direction of the bouncing bird. Collect coins and unlock new birds.
How long can you survive on the Qubes?!

How to play:
Tap anywhere on the screen to change the direction of the bird.
